What is this place?\| And who are you?
We're at the edge of Emerald Glade, \|
a breeding ground for fairy tales.
As for me... I'm Alice. Just a traveler, like you.
What matters is we come from the same place.
Right now, we're both trapped in this realm of fairy tales.
Are you saying were inside a storybook?
This is where fairy tales come to life.
But the characters you meet here wont always play the
roles you know from the stories.
This is their reality now, and their actions might
Not follow the narratives?\! What does that mean?\!
Are they going to hurt us?
Do you know how to get back to our world?
The journey is filled with dangers and challenges.
You said this world isnt as nice as the stories,
\!I'd rather take the one we have some control over.
Sigh... You're right. \.According to what Ive learned,\|
the only way to return home is by collecting seven Tokens
Ive managed to collect a few already.\|
Alice pulls out a golden ring, a book, a small craft bag,
Thats four of them. We only need to collect three more.
Each token is harder to find than the last, and the stories
guarding them have a way of twisting in unpredictable ways.
I wasn't collecting those by myself, \.
on fact I used to have few friend with me.
And they...\. have becamed the token you see
Does that mean... your friends became these tokens?
Yes. They were once my companions.\|
But the stories we faced twisted in ways none of
They paid the price, and now...\|
they're part of this world, bound to these items.
Alice's voice softens as she speaks,
the weight of her memories hanging in the air.
Dont be. If were going to survive here,\|
we need to focus on the path ahead.
Which means... we need to arm you.
In this world, there are two ways to gain power.
The first is to become a character in the story, just like
By re-enacting the tale, I earned the abilities of my role.
Her voice carries a hint of pride, but beneath it lies a trace of sorrow.
The second way,\.is through the power of these tokens.
Each token holds a unique strength. \|
Some can be used as mediums to channel \C[10]Fairy Essence\C[0],
On your way here, you may have passed a broken story monument.\|
It still holds some remnants of Fairy Essence.\|
With that material, we can strengthen you.
We better move now before all the Fairy Essence fade out.
